        public final String masterDetermineDir

        EPHEMERAL directory at: /[appname]/clusters/[grouname]/managed/ImIt

        This directory is the location for determining who is the master (who is "it").

        PERSISTENT directory at: /[appname]/clusters/[clustername]/nodes Subdirectories here are DirMode.EPHEMERAL_SEQUENTIAL and contain data for each node currently participating.
